Name: Lunchroom Grannies
Review Text: Keep doing what you're doing, guys. All the food is made literal meters from where you're sitting and the cook works his eggs amazingly, lifting it to an art. We had the omelette which was insanely large and delicious, with some thick brown bread.

Name: Lunchroom Grannies
Review Text: Cozy atmosphere, delicious food, big portions. Highly recommend!

Name: Lunchroom Grannies
Review Text: Amazing food, the best owners and a satisfied tummy. Grannies is fantastic on multiple level and has now become my go-to for those more continental cravings (including the famous Dutch food) ‚Ä¶

Name: Lunchroom Grannies
Review Text: This place is really sweet, with really good food at a good price. The guys running it were very friendly and the service was excellent, though during the lunch rush it seemed understaffed. They could do with a great barista to take the coffee to the next level. But it's a really charming place with tasty food and a lot of heart.

Name: Lunchroom Grannies
Review Text: Could easily be listed as a top 10 cafes in Amsterdam. Ranks right up there with MOEDERS. Food is very hearty and very Dutch. We had the meatloaf(!) and quiche. Farmers omelette looked tasty too.  Both were amazing.  Decor is very unique ‚Ä¶

Name: Lunchroom Grannies
Review Text: Amazing food! Great location. Highly recommend the fresh mint tea

Name: Lunchroom Grannies
Review Text: The meatloaf was one of the best I ever had, I highly recommend it.

Name: Lunchroom Grannies
Review Text: lovely place to be. kind service and very delicious breakfast ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

Name: Lunchroom Grannies
Review Text: Awesome, delicious food for nice prices and large portions

Name: Lunchroom Grannies
Review Text: The food was very good and priced fair.

Name: Lunchroom Grannies
Review Text: Grannies was a fav of mine when I was a local and it's the best brunch spot in Zuid. French toasts are divine and you really can see they do everything with passion.Hartstikke lekker :)

Name: Lunchroom Grannies
Review Text: Really enjoyable place, food is tasty, and portions are really nice (I mean - soup alone can be a meal), atmosphere slow and cozy. Really had a good vibe there.

Name: Lunchroom Grannies
Review Text: We found it 3 days after enjoying Amsterdam, decoration and attention makes you feel like you are at your friends house üè° they are attending you and are your friends. Food is going to be your fauvourite each midday we both went for a ‚Ä¶

Name: Lunchroom Grannies
Review Text: Went in with my friends and we were hungry. Requested the French toast and Dutch pancakes. The French toast arrived first to one of my friends and the look on his face said it all. Was the best breakfast in my entire life. The Dutch ‚Ä¶

Name: Lunchroom Grannies
Review Text: Such a cozy place. Really nice owners who put a lot of love in their dishes. A nice stew is hard to find in Amsterdam so definitely try the 'zoervleisj' (I think its called that) when you get the chance. The stew was e15.50 & french toast e4,95 so very reasonably priced.

Name: Lunchroom Grannies
Review Text: I do recommend this Amazing place to take a good breakfast in Amsterdam! We discovered in our visit and we are very happy to have found this amazing place! Staff is very friendly and warm, very good service and the menu is very nice!!! I ‚Ä¶

Name: Lunchroom Grannies
Review Text: Food was okay, it‚Äòs a cute cafe. However pooferjes were not fresh (came out of a plastic bag and were just heaten up). Gulash soup had literally only two small pieces of meat. I think we had the last portion. Payment via card not possible - ‚Ä¶

Name: Lunchroom Grannies
Review Text: This place has a very homey and confortable atmosphere. The staff is friendly, the prices are fair (a capuccino is 2.40 and a cake is 3.75). The cheese cake was on point and the hot chocolate came with a delicious little cake and a large portion of whiped cream. It is a great place for a break or for studying.

Name: Lunchroom Grannies
Review Text: Tipycal Dutch caffee and lunch place. I took the omelet: it was good. Service is friendly and in general relaxed. Not bad for having a coffee or a beer with friends.

Name: Lunchroom Grannies
Review Text: Kind master's cozy restaurant with delicious food

Name: Lunchroom Grannies
Review Text: Lovely cakes and sandwiches. I had the fried eggs and bacon on bread - the crispy eggs were perfect and the portion was generous!

Name: Lunchroom Grannies
Review Text: Very good, friendly service. Vibrant, local atmosphere. Omelets were excellent. Only lost a star to the wine (which was OK).

Name: Lunchroom Grannies
Review Text: A very nice place for a late breakfast or lunch. Staff are really friendly and the setting is really quaint. Will be back.

Name: Lunchroom Grannies
Review Text: Delicious! Great service and Nice athmosphere. Best breakfast ever
